cn.description:
Earthquake Network is the most comprehensive app on earthquakes and for most world countries it is the only earthquake early warning system for receiving real time alerts.

Earthquake Network gives you:

- Real time alerts if you live close to the epicentre
- Alerts seconds in advances if you live far from the epicentre
- Real time user reports on felt earthquakes
- Free earthquake data from 21 seismic networks including U.S., Puerto Rico, India, Indonesia, Turkey, Mexico, Chile, Peru, Ecuador, Argentina, Venezuela, Dominican Republic, Colombia, Costa Rica, Nicaragua, China, New Zeland, Japan, Italy, Croatia, Spain and Greece

The Earthquake Network research project (https://www.sismo.app) aims at developing a smartphone-based earthquake early warning system able to detect earthquakes in real time and to alert the population in advance. Smartphones are able to detect earthquakes thanks to the accelerometer on-board each device. When an earthquake is detected, users with the application installed are immediatly alerted. Since earthquake waves travel at around 5 km/s it is possible to alert the population not yet reached by the damaging waves of the earthquake. For the scientific details about the project please refer to the scientific paper on Frontiers at https://bit.ly/2C8B5HI

Subscriptions:

When an earthquake is detected in real time by smartphones near the epicenter, the server sends an alert to all users with the app. Alerting all users can take up to 10 seconds since it is not technically feasible to do so instantly. Now you can join the priority lists of the first 10,000 or 100,000 people alerted in real time. The following subscriptions are available:

- Subscription 10k for 1 year
- Subscription 10k for 1 month 

- Subscription 100k for 1 year
- Subscription 100k for 1 month 

• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Privacy: https://www.sismo.app/privacy

Terms and conditions: https://www.sismo.app/terms-conditions

cn.description:
当您需要一个功能完备的媒体播放器来管理、组织和播放各种类型的视频时，VidHub会满足您的需求！VidHub是一款广受欢迎的媒体播放器，不仅能够播放各种不同格式的视频，，同时，VidHub内置各种媒体库管理、网络共享等功能，提供快速、稳定的视频播放，带来非凡的用户体验。
VidHub的主要功能包括：
- 支持iOS、Mac、Apple TV平台，通过iCloud实现数据同步
- 广泛的视频格式支持 - VidHub能够播放各种格式的视频，包括.mkv、.avi、.mp4、.mov、.rmvb、.wmv等等。让您在一款播放器中体验多样的视频内容。
- 高品质视频播放 - VidHub支持高清、 4K、 HDR 等各种视频，呈现出流畅清晰的视频观感。
- 字幕支持 - VidHub支持视频内置字幕，并可以挂载多种外置字幕格式，例如SRT,SSA,SUB，并支持字幕调整功能。用户可以根据需要开启或关闭字幕，获得良好的观看体验。
- 网络共享媒体库 - VidHub支持访问多种网络共享协议，包括 SMB/CIFS，WebDav，也支持访问云端视频文件，例如Dropbox, Google Drive， OneDrive，百度网盘，阿里云盘, 移动云盘, 115 盘，天翼云盘。方便您轻松访问云端视频和其他WebDav服务器上的媒体库。
- 支持下载、删除云端文件
- 支持重命名云端文件，支持添加字符、替换字符、正则表达式重命名方式
- 支持直连Emby、Jellyfin、Plex媒体库 - 连上即可播放，无需再为追剧看片烦恼。
- 方便的文件管理 - VidHub有自己的媒体库管理器，并支持用美观简洁的界面展示视频的清单。用户可以按照类型、日期、分级、评分等分类，快速找到需要的媒体文件。

总的来说，VidHub是一款功能丰富的媒体播放器，能够管理、组织和播放各种媒体文件。VidHub会让您的视频播放更加愉悦，让您获得高质量的观看体验。

注意：影片资料和封面是由 TMDB 提供，TMDB 是一个由网络社区维护的电影和电视节目免费数据库。

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use

cn.description:
MagicKit AI – 全能设备与实用工具包

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的实用工具应用，旨在帮助您监控设备状态、优化性能，并从一个便捷界面访问日常工具。专为 iOS 打造，MagicKit AI 集合了多种核心功能，同时保护您的隐私并节省电池。

设备与系统工具：

网络工具：
• 网速测试：测量您的互联网连接速度
• Wi-Fi 信息：查看网络名称、IP 地址和连接状态

实用工具：
• 单位换算器：支持多种单位互转
• 货币转换器：实时汇率与换算
• 日期时间计算器：支持工作日差值计算
• 时区转换器：全球时间转换，含夏令时支持
• 倒计时与提醒：创建美观倒计时，可自定义提醒与重复事件
• Magic 计数器：多项目统计追踪，含连续天数与数据统计
• 二维码扫描：快速识别二维码
• 文档扫描：高质量扫描保存文档
• 指南针与水平仪：使用设备传感器测量方向与水平

• 音频检测仪：通过麦克风测量环境音量
• 剪贴板管理器：访问并管理当前会话复制内容
• 手电筒：开启设备手电筒
• 亮度调节：直接在应用内调整屏幕亮度

功能亮点：
• 简洁易用的向导式界面
• 无广告，无内购
• 轻量节能
• 兼容所有 iOS 设备
• 工具持续更新添加
• 注重隐私与性能设计

歡迎來到 1980 年代。在這髮型浮誇和粉色系西裝當道的年代，一個男人在成群罪犯中崛起的故事於焉展開。Grand Theft Auto 回來了。在這個縱慾過度、充滿可能性的五光十色熱帶城市，一齣關於湯米．凡賽堤（Tommy Vercetti）遭到背叛和復仇的故事正悄悄上演。

hk.description:
MagicKit AI – 全方位裝置與工具箱

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的實用工具應用程式，專為 iOS 設計，幫助您監控裝置狀態、優化效能，並透過單一介面輕鬆使用日常工具。功能齊全，兼顧隱私與電池續航。

裝置與系統工具：
• 電池狀態：查看目前電量與充電情況
• 儲存空間使用：分析已用與可用空間
• 裝置資訊：查看基本硬體與系統資訊
• 開機時間追蹤：監控裝置開機持續時間
• 電池小貼士：提供實用省電建議
• 相片清理：偵測與刪除重複或相似相片釋放空間

網路工具：
• 網速測試：測量網路連線速度
• Wi-Fi 資訊：查看網路名稱、IP 位址與連線狀態
• IP 查詢：查看公網 IP 的地理位置資訊

實用工具：
• 單位換算器：支援各類單位轉換
• 貨幣換算器：即時匯率與幣值轉換
• 日期時間計算器：支援工作日計算的日期差異
• 時區轉換器：全球時間轉換，支援夏令時間顯示
• 倒數計時與提醒：建立美觀倒數計時，支援提醒與重複事件
• Magic 計數器：追蹤多個計數器，提供統計與連續天數
• QR 掃描器：快速掃描二維碼
• 文件掃描器：高品質掃描與儲存文件
• 指南針與水平儀：使用裝置感應器測量方向與水平
• 螢幕方向鎖定：於應用內鎖定螢幕方向
• 音量測量儀：透過麥克風測量環境音量
• 剪貼簿管理器：管理當前應用中的複製內容
• 手電筒：開啟裝置手電筒照明
• 螢幕亮度調整：可於應用內直接調整亮度

特色亮點：
• 簡潔直覺的導引式介面
• 無廣告、無內購
• 輕巧省電
• 支援所有 iOS 裝置
• 持續新增工具與更新
• 重視隱私與效能

適用族群：
• 裝置監控與效能優化
• 日常測量與轉換任務
• 掃描文件與 QR 碼
• 相片清理與空間管理
• 倒數提醒與計劃管理
• 追蹤習慣與統計進度
• 快速使用工具如手電筒與亮度調整
• 執行簡易網路測試診斷

立即下載 MagicKit AI，使用一款智慧又強大的工具箱，簡化您的日常工作與生活！

mo.description:
《機械迷城》(Machinarium)是由《銀河歷險記》(Samorost)和《植物精靈》(Botanicula)的製作者開發的屢獲殊榮的獨立冒險遊戲。

《機械迷城》(Machinarium)是一個完整長度的冒險遊戲。玩家將扮演一個流亡到垃圾堆的小機器人，從廢料場返回城市，並打敗壞人黑帽兄弟，拯救他的機器人女友。玩家需要使用邏輯、收集重要資訊及物品，來解決各式難題，才可以拯救機器人女友。快一起和可愛的小機器人，解開重重的謎團吧！

絕對好玩 - TouchArcade
4/4 - USA TODAY
4/4 - SlideToPlay
9/10 - Pocket Gamer

獎項：
- IGF，卓越視覺藝術獎
- Gamasutra，年度最佳獨立遊戲獎
- VGChartz.com，年度最佳獨立遊戲獎

mo.description:
透過無數選項佈置地宮的Roguelike類地宮建造遊戲。
在地宮佈置各種陷阱和設施，並雇傭可透過戰鬥成長的怪獸，發現神秘力量的神器，擊退攻擊地宮的勇士！

◆ 內容
 - 以特殊能力指揮地宮的9名魔王！
 - 300多種勇士及怪物
 - 地宮內可佈置的100多種陷阱及設施
 - 200多種神秘的神器
 - 各種活動
 - 各種解鎖要素
目前還在不斷開發新的內容。
我們將持續增加更多魔王和陷阱及怪獸，並準備各種遊戲模式。

◆ 創造屬於自己的地宮
請慎重佈置陷阱、設施及怪獸。利用擊退勇士獲得的獎勵，可建造更強力的地宮。考慮各個設施及怪獸的特性找出最佳組合，並建造具有最佳效率的地宮。

◆ 探險命運
每天獲得新的命運卡牌。想要戰鬥就迎接勇士，需要娛樂就進行活動。如果要與強敵對戰，就可將強力的勇士召喚至地宮。
每一場遊戲可選擇不同命運，給您帶來各種新的體驗。

-SUPPORT-
E-Mail : support@gamecoaster.com
Tel :+82 10-4178-0283

◎ iCloud 備份和恢復
◎ Dropbox 備份和恢復

◎ 多種顏色主題及牆紙，讓您充分個性化
◎ 自定義收支類別和消費賬戶，更符合您的需要
◎ 同時支援 iPhone 和 iPad
◎ 每日記賬提醒

增強功能：
◎ 通過手勢輕鬆複製歷史記錄，並自動將消費日期定位在當天，您只需要修改金額即可。當然，您也可以使用現有金額直接儲存
◎ 帳單編輯時也可以新增收支類別和消費賬戶，更可以點選國旗更改當前消費的幣種

us.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

Record every dollar, take control of your finances. A clutter-free budgeting app with zero ads, zero splash screens, and zero financial product promotions.

• Auto-Tracking: Seamlessly integrates with Shortcuts for automatic expense capture triggered by your transactions
• Versatile Entries: Track income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management
• Powerful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns through pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly spot financial issues

■ COMPREHENSIVE ASSET MANAGEMENT
• Unified dashboard for all account types (cash, checking accounts, credit cards, store cards)
• Balance sheet and net worth tracking for real-time financial status monitoring

■ SMART FEATURES
• Multiple Books: Easily separate personal, business, and project finances
• Collaborative Tracking: Invite family members to create transparent household finances
• Cloud Sync: Free data backup across devices with secure protection
• Easy Import/Export: Support for importing from banking apps and exporting to Excel

■ MULTI-DEVICE EXPERIENCE

■ FOCUSED ON FINANCIAL WELLNESS
We're dedicated to one mission — helping you achieve financial clarity. No investment pitches, no social distractions, just a clean and effective expense tracking experience.

“Pasha Planet: Reborn” is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters’ daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay.

[Game Overview]
 The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes!

[Game Features]
- Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan.
- Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay.
- Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes.
- Challenging puzzles and stages.

us.description:
Imagine a magical factory, appearing right in your living room. A carefully planned masterpiece, where diligent workers throw together anything customers want. Rubber ducks and dressers, drones and electric guitars, scooters and other wonderful goods can be created from many different materials and sold for hard cash – cash you invest right back into your factory to get more machines, more workers and grow your business. In Little Big Workshop you become a factory tycoon!

Real factories - made FUN
You are the Big Boss and it’s time to take charge of your very own tabletop factory. Organize the factory floor, manage your workers, purchase machinery, and design efficient production lines - all within the time-limit and to your client's satisfaction! 

An open-ended sandbox-experience
Take it easy, it’s a sandbox-experience where you think, ponder and poke at things until you get it to work the way you’d like. Supply products to clients and an ever-changing market, as you produce over 50 unique product types, built from multiple parts and pieces - all of which can be created with different materials and production methods. No two factories should ever look the same.

Tiny hands, big dreams
Start out with just a small workshop and expand to a desk-filling factory. Unlock ever fancier machines, add even more production methods, and most of all, more room. Soon enough you’ll be running multiple production lines, producing hundreds of advanced products each day, and watching with joy as your cute workers do the actual work.

Features:
- Varying industries and a wide range of products
- Focus on practical problems, not on values, economics, or logistics
- Organize all steps of the production on a blueprint
- Factories grow as you unlock more desk space
- Fully simulated Day/Night-cycle
- Take care of your workers! Work them too hard and they drop like flies
- Cute model-town art-style

us.description:
Burn rubber and shred metal in the ultimate driving playground!

Wreckfest is jam-packed with upgrade and customization options. Whether you are preparing for your next demolition derby with reinforced bumpers, roll cages, side protectors and much more, or setting your car up for a banger race with engine performance parts like air filters, camshafts, fuel systems, etc., Wreckfest is shaping up to be the best combative motorsport game out there. 

• Unique Racing Experience – Exhilarating no-rules racing action with defining, once-in-a-lifetime moments that can be achieved only with a true-to-life physics simulation. Witness insane neck-to-neck fighting on high-speed circuits, face total destruction madness on crazy courses with intersections and oncoming traffic, or go for demolition dominance in derby arenas.

• Awesome Cars – Our cars are old, banged up, patched together... They ooze style and character! From old American heavy-hitters to agile Europeans and fun Asians, you won’t find anything like this in other games. 

• Meaningful Customization – Change not only the look of your cars but also upgrade their body armor – Reinforce them with heavy iron that protects you from damage, but also adds weight, which impacts the cars handling. Modify your car to make a robust tank or a fragile but lightning-fast rocket, or anything in between!

• Multiplayer – Wreck your friends in local multiplayer and take racing to the limit while chasing for demolition dominance!

• Challenge modes – Have hilarious fun with crop harvesters, lawn mowers, school buses, three-wheelers and much more! 

• Career Mode – Battle for championships, earn experience, unlock new upgrades and cars, and become the all-time Wreckfest champion!

A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity

Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. 

FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps:

Halkın vereceğin kararları bekliyor! Generaller, din adamları, müttefikler ve düşmanlar, hepsinin bitmek bilmeyen isteklerini cevaplarken iktidarındaki dengeyi kaybetme! 

Başkanlığının her yılında bambaşka olaylar ile karşılaşırken, seçimlerinin ülke hazinesi, halk, ordu ve otoriten üzerinde sonuçları olacak. İktidarını korumak için kararlarını verirken bu dört gücün dengesini kaybetmemelisin.

Bir başkan olarak, iktidarını kaybetmemek için vurdumduymaz, hoşgörülü, acımasız ya da sevgi dolu kararlar vermen gerekecek, bir sonraki kararının sonuçlarını iyi düşünerek, seçimlerini buna göre yapmalı ve iktidarda kaldığın süreyi uzatmalısın, başkanlığın boyunca ittifaklar, hainler ve hatta gizemli misafirler ile uğraşacak ve pek çok farklı sona ulaşacaksın!

tr.description:
Kararların tahtta kalma süreni belirleyecek.

Monarşi'de hüküm verebilecek tek kişi sensin! Tahtta olduğun sürede herkesin senden istekleri olacak, her seçim devletinin başka bir gücünü etkileyecek, tahtı kaybetmemek için dengeyi korumalısın! 

Tahtının yanında topraklarını korumak içinde kararlar vermen gerekecek, İstanbul'un Fethi, Termopylae Muharebesi, Niğbolu Muharebesi, Deligrad Savaşı ve Alaşehir Kuşatması gibi tarihten gerçek savaşların taktiklerinin basitleştirilmiş halleri ile bir komutan olarak hükümler vererek fetihler yapacaksın.

Hüküm sürdüğün her ay bambaşka bir sorun ile karşılaşırken, seçimlerinin devlet hazinesi, halk, ordu ve otoriten üzerinde sonuçları olacak. Devletin sorunlarının yanında savaşlarda belirleyeceğin taktikler daha fazla toprak feth edip edemeyeceğini belirleyecek. Din adamlarının, halkının, saray hanedanının istekleri seni yıpratırken, savaşlar, haşhaşiler ve gizemli misafirler ile uğraşman gerekecek.

Hükümdar olarak, iktidarını kaybetmemek için vurdumduymaz, hoşgörülü, acımasız ya da sevgi dolu kararlar vermen gerekecek, seçimlerini saray entrikalarını düşünerek yapmalı ve tahtta kaldığın süreyi uzatmalısın, zira pek çok talibi var.

tr.description:
Tüm dünyayı kendine inandırabilir misin?

Yeni bir inanç ortaya çıktı ve bunu yaymak için sen seçildin. 
İnsanlığın senden ve sözlerinden nefret etmek için hep bir sebebi olacak, yapman gereken sözlerin, mucizelerin kullanmak ve inancın üzerinde yaptığın geliştirmelerin ile dinini tüm dünyaya inandırmak. Nefretlerini kazanmadan insanlar ile konuşmalı, şehirleri gezmeli ve mucizelerin ile yanlışları düzeltmelisin.

Mısır, Kudüs ya da Roma'dan başlayacağın seyahatinde yüzlerce hikaye ve kişi ile karşılaşacak, inancını tüm dünyaya yaymaya çalışırken yirmi farklı sondan birine ulaşacaksın.

Serüvenin boyunca daha fazla inanana ulaşmak için dinini, mucizeler ve felaketler yapabilmek için kendini geliştirebilirsin. 

Sözlerinin etkileri dünyada kaos yaratırken, sen insanların nefreti, yalanlar, krallar ve iblisler ile uğraşarak tüm insanlığın inandığı bir din yaratmalısın.

Yasal Bilgilendirme;
Bu oyun içerisinde, gerçekte var olan herhangi bir inanç ile ilgili hiç bir olay, kişi, hikaye ve kelime kullanılmamıştır. Oyun içerisinde anlatılan hikaye eski bir dönemde geçtiği için tarihi devlet sınırları üzerinden hayali bir harita oluşturulmuştur. Bu oyun içerisinde yer alan karakterler, olaylar, hikayeler ve kelimelerin tamamı hayal ürünüdür ve gerçeği yansıtmamaktadır.

tr.description:
MagicKit AI – All-in-One Device and Utility Toolkit

MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life.

Device and System Tools
• Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state
• Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage
• Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details
• Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running
• Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage
• Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space
• Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries
• RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance
• Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance

Network Tools
• Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed
• Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status
• IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses
• Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude

Security & Privacy Tools
• Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options
• Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases
• UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats
• Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options
• Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection

Utility Tools
• Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements
• Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies
• Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support
• Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status
• Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events
• Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks
• QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly
• Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition
• Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors
• Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app
• Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone
• Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session
• Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness
• Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup
• Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more

Highlights
• Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools
• Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities
• No ads or in-app purchases
• Lightweight and battery-efficient
• Compatible with all iOS devices
• Frequent updates with new tools
• Built with privacy and performance in mind
• Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations

Perfect for
• Device monitoring and optimization
• Everyday measurement and conversion tasks
• Scanning documents and QR codes
• Cleaning up photo storage and contacts
• Creating and managing countdowns with reminders
• Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters
• Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control
• Performing simple network diagnostics
• Generating secure passwords and managing privacy
• Taking quick notes and organizing information

Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

“Pasha Planet: Reborn” is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters’ daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay.

[Game Overview]
 The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes!

[Game Features]
- Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan.
- Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay.
- Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes.
- Challenging puzzles and stages.

tr.description:
Imagine a magical factory, appearing right in your living room. A carefully planned masterpiece, where diligent workers throw together anything customers want. Rubber ducks and dressers, drones and electric guitars, scooters and other wonderful goods can be created from many different materials and sold for hard cash – cash you invest right back into your factory to get more machines, more workers and grow your business. In Little Big Workshop you become a factory tycoon!

Real factories - made FUN
You are the Big Boss and it’s time to take charge of your very own tabletop factory. Organize the factory floor, manage your workers, purchase machinery, and design efficient production lines - all within the time-limit and to your client's satisfaction! 

An open-ended sandbox-experience
Take it easy, it’s a sandbox-experience where you think, ponder and poke at things until you get it to work the way you’d like. Supply products to clients and an ever-changing market, as you produce over 50 unique product types, built from multiple parts and pieces - all of which can be created with different materials and production methods. No two factories should ever look the same.

Tiny hands, big dreams
Start out with just a small workshop and expand to a desk-filling factory. Unlock ever fancier machines, add even more production methods, and most of all, more room. Soon enough you’ll be running multiple production lines, producing hundreds of advanced products each day, and watching with joy as your cute workers do the actual work.

Features:
- Varying industries and a wide range of products
- Focus on practical problems, not on values, economics, or logistics
- Organize all steps of the production on a blueprint
- Factories grow as you unlock more desk space
- Fully simulated Day/Night-cycle
- Take care of your workers! Work them too hard and they drop like flies
- Cute model-town art-style

tr.description:
Burn rubber and shred metal in the ultimate driving playground!

Wreckfest is jam-packed with upgrade and customization options. Whether you are preparing for your next demolition derby with reinforced bumpers, roll cages, side protectors and much more, or setting your car up for a banger race with engine performance parts like air filters, camshafts, fuel systems, etc., Wreckfest is shaping up to be the best combative motorsport game out there. 

• Unique Racing Experience – Exhilarating no-rules racing action with defining, once-in-a-lifetime moments that can be achieved only with a true-to-life physics simulation. Witness insane neck-to-neck fighting on high-speed circuits, face total destruction madness on crazy courses with intersections and oncoming traffic, or go for demolition dominance in derby arenas.

• Awesome Cars – Our cars are old, banged up, patched together... They ooze style and character! From old American heavy-hitters to agile Europeans and fun Asians, you won’t find anything like this in other games. 

• Meaningful Customization – Change not only the look of your cars but also upgrade their body armor – Reinforce them with heavy iron that protects you from damage, but also adds weight, which impacts the cars handling. Modify your car to make a robust tank or a fragile but lightning-fast rocket, or anything in between!

• Multiplayer – Wreck your friends in local multiplayer and take racing to the limit while chasing for demolition dominance!

• Challenge modes – Have hilarious fun with crop harvesters, lawn mowers, school buses, three-wheelers and much more! 

• Career Mode – Battle for championships, earn experience, unlock new upgrades and cars, and become the all-time Wreckfest champion!

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

tr.description:
A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity

Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. 

FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps:
1) Decide on a single task to be done.
2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes).
3) Take a short break (5 minutes).
4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes)

Features
- Elegant minimalist design
- Daily Summary
- Beautiful crafted design themes
- Quotes to inspire and motivate you
- Custom timer duration for your tasks


Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!
